alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 12:39PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ MONDAY TO 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts in the heavier snow bands. Northwest wind gusts of 35 mph to as high as 45 mph lakeside causing blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ Monday to 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult. Strong wind gusts with falling snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning, but especially the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
